description: Zenvia is a Communications Platform as a Service (CPaaS) platform, offering APIs that simplify the integration of communication capabilities into apps, services, or processes and enable companies to manage communications across channels. The company went public on the NASDAQ in July 2021.
Zid is a SaaS-based “e-commerce in a box solution” that enables retailers to easily build and manage an online store presence.

Zippedi digitizes brick and mortar stores using a RaaS (Robotics as a Service) model. It enables retailers, CPGs, and service providers to leverage digital insights to solve key, costly industry challenges, including out-of-stock inventory and last-mile delivery.
Zolvers is an online marketplace for domestic worker and handyman referrals, connecting clients to pre-screened service professionals in major cities.
Zooba offers authentic Egyptian fast food cuisine.

Zup is a software engineering company that enables partners’ growth by offering large database analysis as a service. This includes digital strategy consulting, agile development, as well as growth hacking support. The company was acquired by Itau bank in 2019.
